options.imageAlt: In this photograph, a sandstorm threatens a town in the Sahara. A wall of dust, many times larger than the buildings, approaches the town.

options.title: hgg
options.imageAlt: In this photograph, a gentle river flows through a tropical rain forest in the Amazon. The vegetation is thick and bright green.

configuration.imageAlt: In this illustration, Earth's landforms are shown as they appear from space. Africa and South American are separated by the Atlantic Ocean.
